main event: A civilian witness observed a white, oval-shaped object larger than a basketball that turned orange, hovering in the sky for about 15 minutes before disappearing when the witness went inside to call and report the sighting.
interesting points: The object was observed near the town of Anacostia in the 3300 block of Nichols Street.
At least four aircraft were reported to be in the area over Bolling Air Force Base during the sighting.
The airdrome officer at Bolling AFB believed the object may have been the navigation lights of landing aircraft.
The witness was described as a civilian, 23 years old, and a secretary.
The weather conditions were reported as CAVU (ceiling and visibility unlimited) with no forecaster on duty at the time.
sighted object: white, oval-shaped object larger than a basketball that turned orange
photographs: no photographs present in the report
